recipe_name: Peach pancakes with peach and cranberry sauce
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the pancakes, place all of the pancake ingredients, except for the knob of butter, into a food processor and blend to make a smooth batter. Melt the small knob of butter in a crÃªpe pan over a medium to high heat and spoon a quarter of the batter mixture onto the hot pan, swirling around to cover the pan base. Cook for 30 seconds on each side, or until golden and cooked. Transfer to a plate and fold in half and then in half again. For the sauce, heat the ingredients in a small frying pan until the liquid has reduced and thickened. Pour over the pancakes to serve.
ingredients: 200ml/8fl oz whole milk,  2 free-range eggs,  110g/4oz plain flour,  pinch salt,  1 tbsp melted butter,  small knob of butter,  peach half from a can, chopped,  syrup from a can of peaches,  large handful dried cranberries
